name: How To Move On
description:
My entry for Bolt Jam #6!

Overcome tragedies that LIFE throws at you balancing SADNESS and STRESS levels until you are ready to MOVE ON. Your final goal is to reach full ACCEPTANCE.

CONTROLS

(hold) Left arrow / A : GIVE UP!
(hold) Right arrow / D : TOUGHEN UP!
Up arrow / W : MOVE ON!

Made with Unity (Bolt, Peek, Text Mesh Pro, Post Processing Stack v2). Assets used:

- Font (https://www.1001fonts.com/)

- GIFs (https://funnygifsbox.com/24-lovely-frog-chat-expression-picture-emoji)
